code: import{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[log,setLog]=useState([]);const[darkMode,setDarkMode]=useState(false);const handleClick=action=>{const time=new Date().toLocaleTimeString();setLog(prev=>[...prev,"".concat(time," \u2014 ").concat(action)]);};const toggleDarkMode=()=>setDarkMode(!darkMode);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container ".concat(darkMode?'dark':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDD0D User Interaction Tracker"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"toggle",onClick:toggleDarkMode,children:darkMode?'‚òÄÔ∏è Light Mode':'üåô Dark Mode'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"This simple app logs interactions like button clicks and typing."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleClick('Clicked Button A'),children:"Click A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleClick('Clicked Button B'),children:"Click B"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Type something...",onChange:e=>handleClick("Typed: ".concat(e.target.value))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"log-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"log-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCCB Event Log"}),log.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"clear-btn",onClick:()=>setLog([]),children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Clear Log"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:log.slice().reverse().map((entry,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:entry},idx))})]})]});}export default App;
